question: when do you pray the chaplet of divine mercy
vanilla_rag_result: The Chaplet of Divine Mercy can be prayed at any time, but it is especially recommended to be said on Divine Mercy Sunday and Fridays at 3:00 PM, which is known as the Hour of Mercy. Additionally, it is often prayed daily at the National Shrine of The Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts, and in the Philippines, a portion of the chaplet is broadcast daily at 3:00 PM. In a novena, the chaplet is typically prayed each day from Good Friday to Divine Mercy Sunday.
